EmailTemplate.name: 201901_Global_Emails_FlightBagPro_BetaLaunch_mih.201901_Global_Teaser_FlightBagP
EmailTemplate.subject: Your New GoDirect™ Flight Planning Experience Is on Its Way!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customers,
Soon, you’ll get an opportunity to test our new flight planning technology.
Here is what we are working on: safety enhancements, making your flight planning experience friendlier, more intuitive, and many other improvements. We hope you will join us and give it a try, then provide feedback to help us make it even better.
Look for an invite soon!
Our Best,
GoDirect Flight Services
